GetEntriesResponse.description: The result of requesting the GetEntries endpoint for a specific file.

logEntry.example: INFO - Your service is amazing. Thought you should know.

get.summary: Gets the latest log entries from the specified file.
get.description: Allows callers to specify a log file from the pre-configured directory and retrieve N number of latest entries.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to get the entries from.

parameters.name: numEntries
parameters.description: The number of entries to return from the specified file name.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A simple string to search in the result set.

400.description: Returned if the query parameters are not correctly formed.

403.description: Returned when the requested file could not be read because it didn't have sufficient permissions.

404.description: Returned when the requested file is not found.
